n: White Russian ..Because Joe Perry Drank Them!
des: "I wanted to drink a White Russian after I read that Joe Perry from Aerosmith drank them for breakfast in his wild days! Although I'm not the coffee flavor lover, I tried them and they were good!! Easy to make..perfect for after work...relaxing...listening to Aerosmith!!"
ins: Place the ice cubes in a highball glass, or one of similar size. Pour the coffee, vodka and cream over the ice. Stir and serve. No garnishes here.
